intro.title: Community
intro.subtitle: Connect with farmers, experts, and innovators who are passionate about sustainable agricultural waste management. Share ideas, ask questions, and collaborate!

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Meet other farmers, researchers, and eco-entrepreneurs who share your goals.

share.title: Share
share.description: Post your challenges, success stories, and ask questions to learn together.

learn.title: Learn
learn.description: Discover innovative waste management practices and earn from your knowledge.
